name: person proj
description:
please for the love of god help me make my own game

HEY! welcome to the beginning of the worlds worst best game ever!

person proj is a game. it has about nothing in it exept for a total of 5 cubes, and you!

you walk around, and thats about it until i learn more about unity and how to make good games.

HOW DO I PLAY THIS GREAT GAME???, i hear you ask well just extract the zip file and double click the personproj1.exe file.

have fun!
